name: InventorControl
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
You can simply ask Alexa to control your Inventor Products and stay in touch with your home or office.

You can enjoy the voice control on your devices like these:
“Alexa, turn on the air conditioner.”
“Alexa, turn off the bedroom light.”
“Alexa, set the fan speed to low on the dehumidifier.”
“Alexa, set the temperature to 24 degrees Celcius on the air conditioner."

You can connect Alexa to your Inventor Control products in a few simple steps:
1.Download “Inventor Control” App and register an account
2.Configure some devices on “Inventor Control” App
3.Download Amazon "Alexa" app and configure Echo with "Alexa" app
4.Search "Inventor Control" skill from the "Alexa" app skills category
5.Click Enable skill,and you will be navigated to login page
6.Open “Inventor Control“ App—— More Service —— Link with Verification Code —— copy the Code —— Put code into the login page, you'll be redirect to the success page
7.Now all setup is finished.
You can enjoy the voice control on your home devices.
